column2: futhi ukuthi lapho kakhulu i kepha noma uma kanye wami umalume wakhe akhe manje yakhe kodwa zakhe ku isikhathi lapha lokhu ke lo u naye we izandla ngabe uluiza ngemuva nge sakhe lokho ukuze kusho amabala khona ukuba ngakho le cha ngaphandle a ye lutho kimi impilo akazange kwesinye lakhe igazi kwe yini kwami yebo omncane ukube ngoba yena amehlo indoda kufanele izifundo esikhulu amakhulu ngamandla kuze kahle kwakho njengoba yonke muhle umuntu yami leli akukho naturalism kube isineke nokho impela zami ngiphendula lidenbrock phakathi kwakhe kwakuyinto mnu kungani bonke thina hhayi ukuthola ngokushesha ngokweqile kusukela axel ukuhlolwa okuhle kuphendula
